content.prompt: Scholars believe that the work was used for which of the following purposes?

choices.label: For elite religious rituals held in underground temples
For prophetic acts to divine the future and understand the past
As a family portrait of powerful ruling siblings
As an offering made to accompany the deceased in burial

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
